author: duncan
msg: Insert of license headers, added fix for CVS directory walking, commented
some code.

author: costin
msg: Simplified tomcat-build.xml - test will be in a different xml,
added comments ( sort of :-), added "package" target.

author: costin
msg: -added a trivial Echo task
- new "nightly" script in ant - get sources and build
Note: it gets the snapshot instead of CVS - taz is slow and
I see no reason to add all the CVS overhead when all we need is
a read-only snapshot.

author: costin
msg: - changed Main to accept multiple targets in command line.
That means: "ant getSource dist" will get the sources from taz
and build. If dist depens on getSource - we can't guess the if
we have to get a new snapshot or not.
- Fixed copydir - if the dir doesn't exist report that, don't throw
NullPointer ( XXX should we just print a warning or abort ?)
Thanks "James Burlingame" <jb@adhesive.com> - I'll add the other patch
asap.
- In Project.resolveFile(), deal with absolute filenames ( if it
start with "/" )

author: costin
msg: 3 new ant actions:
- cvs uses exec ( it still need work )
- get will download a file
- expand will unzip a file
Get/Expand can be used to get "snapshot" sources in
a portable way ( since cvs is slower ).
